Uses of Class
ace.concurrency.Job

  • Packages that use Job 
    Package Description
    ace.concurrency  

    • Uses of Job in ace.concurrency

      Methods in ace.concurrency that return Job 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Job Job.eachMilliseconds(long value)
      Sets the job to be executed every few milliseconds, which amount is the specified.
      Job Job.eachMillisecondsAfterLastJobFinished(long value)
      Sets the job to be executed a few milliseconds, which amount is the specified, after the last job finished its execution.
      Job Job.eachSeconds(long value)
      Sets the job to be executed every few seconds, which amount is the specified.
      Job Job.eachSecondsAfterLastJobFinished(long value)
      Sets the job to be executed a few seconds, which amount is the specified, after the last job finished its execution.
      protected Job Job.setExecutionTime(boolean postScheduled, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit, long amount)
      Sets the job execution time with the specified time amount and unit, and indicating if it is post scheduled or not.
      Job Job.setName(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the job name.
      protected Job Job.setRunnable(java.lang.Runnable value)
      Sets the job runnable.
      protected Job Job.setScheduledFuture(java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> value)
      Sets the job schedule future.
      Job Job.untilDecision(Decisor decision)
      Sets the job to be executed until the stop decision turns true.
      Job Job.untilTimes(long count)
      Sets the job to be executed until the count reaches 0.
      Methods in ace.concurrency with parameters of type Job 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> Scheduler.submit(Job job)
      Submits the specified job for execution.
      java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> Scheduler.submit(Job job, long initialDelay)
      Submits the specified job for execution with the specified initial delay.
      static boolean Schedulers.submit(java.lang.String name, Job job)
      Submits the specified job to the scheduler with the specified name.
      static boolean Schedulers.submit(java.lang.String name, Job job, long initialDelay)
      Submits the specified job to the scheduler with the specified name and with the initial delay.
